column4: what is the difference between ubuntu-6.06-dvd-i386.iso and ubuntu-6.06-desktop-i386.iso ? i want install it in my laptop
the dvd version contains both the livecd version AND the standard install version. The desktop version is a liveCD that you can install as well.
In other words, you can download either, and get a disc that lets you both run Ubuntu from disc and install it.
